review: I have an ASUS RT-N56U router.  The Chromecast compatibility site says setup with this router does not require any modifications to the settings... Wrong!  That site listed firmware that is several revisions old and with the version on my router and any newer firmware, it requires a ton of changes.  Google this router model and Chromecast to find several web sites describing the various settings needed to get Chromecast to work... I almost returned it but after several hours, I got it to install.  Once installed it works great with all our android devices.
author: NHConcernedConsumer
